author: Jennifer Oldham
title: This Sanctuary Took In Dozens Of 'Tiger King' Joe Exotic's Tigers. Now It's Struggling To Stay Afloat In The Pandemic
description: The Wild Animal Sanctuary, which relocated the 39 tigers to sprawling enclosures on the Colorado prairie, has lost both food and financial donations during the coronavirus pandemic.
content: The Wild Animal Sanctuary near Keenesburg, Colo. which relocated Fireball, Pearl, Enzo and 36 other cats two years ago to sprawling enclosures on its 789 acres is experiencing a simultaneous drop in food and financial donations caused by panic buying and soar… [+5895 chars]
